translation.en: I've just had the trippiest bleedin' buzz of me life in there with that reverend.

translation.en: Yeah, quite interesting.

translation.en: - Food shopping! - Well, they must've heard shoe,
translation.es: - A comprar comida. - Debieron oír zapato

translation.en: Wanna share with us how this week has been for you?
translation.es: ¿Quieres compartirnos cómo ha sido tu semana?

translation.en: In a chaotic life for me, it's been a welcome escape
translation.es: En una vida caótica, ha sido un escape

translation.en: to come here, somewhere calm,
translation.es: venir aquí a un lugar tranquilo

translation.en: and feed off the positive energy of yourself, and the people here.
translation.es: y alimentarme de la energía positiva de la gente aquí.

translation.en: It made me focus in on the hard work that I have ahead of me
translation.es: Me hizo concentrarme en el trabajo duro por delante,

translation.en: and I'm very excited by that.
translation.es: eso me emociona mucho.

translation.en: I appreciate your hospitality. Thank you, thank you.
translation.es: Agradezco tu hospitalidad. Gracias.

translation.en: Very good.
translation.es: Muy bien.

translation.en: This has been... It's kind of a bit sad I have to go, you know what I mean?
translation.es: Esto ha sido… es triste que daba irme, ¿me entiendes?

translation.en: I don't gotta go for another couple of days, I can stay!
translation.es: No quiero irme en dos días, puedo quedarme.

translation.en: He has made mistakes. Mistakes that I absolutely don't condone.
translation.es: Ha cometido errores. Errores que no apruebo.

translation.en: I know he regrets them.
translation.es: Se que se arrepiente.

translation.en: He's paid for them, he's trying to learn, trying to move on.
translation.es: Pagó por eso, intenta aprender y seguir adelante.

translation.en: I hope we return to the positive things.
translation.es: Espero que retomemos lo positivo.

translation.en: The goal- setting,
translation.es: El fijar metas,

translation.en: the work ethic, and I know Conor does as well.
translation.es: la ética de trabajo, y Conor también tiene eso.

translation.en: Three, two, one, go!
translation.es: ¡Tres, dos, uno, vamos!

translation.en: After my first defeat, I got caught not taking it serious enough.
translation.es: 5 MES DESPUÉS DE MCGREGOR VS. KHABIB Tras mi primer derrota, no la tomé muy en serio.

translation.en: I got caught not taking the mental approach serious enough.
translation.es: No tomé en serio el enfoque mental.

translation.en: And then I said, I'm going to put everything into this.
translation.es: Y luego dije, pondré todo en esto.

translation.en: That won't happen to me again.
translation.es: Eso no volverá a pasarme.

translation.en: I won't get caught not fully committed to it.
translation.es: No volveré a hacerlo sin estar comprometido.

translation.en: Slipping, know what I mean?
translation.es: El fallar, ¿me entiendes?

translation.en: You're either in it until death,
translation.es: Te metes en esto a morir

translation.en: or you're not in it at all.
translation.es: o no te metes.

translation.en: 2018 ended with the UFC's biggest star
translation.es: El 2018 terminó con la estrella de la UFC

translation.en: being outclassed by Khabib in the Octagon, without a title,
translation.es: vencida por Khabib en el octágono, sin un título,

translation.en: and without a win in over two years.
translation.es: y sin ganar en dos años.

translation.en: Everyone wants to see Conor fall flat on his face.
translation.es: Todos quieren ver caer a Conor.

translation.en: Over the past year, he has given us lots of reasons to root against him.
translation.es: El año pasado nos dio razones para no apoyarlo.

translation.en: Conor's best days are long gone. They're behind him.
translation.es: Los mejores días de Conor pasaron, quedaron atrás.

translation.en: 2018 was hard for him.
translation.es: El 2018 fue difícil para él.

translation.en: A lot of people were wondering, can he get back on track?
translation.es: Muchos se preguntaron, ¿podrá retomar el camino?

translation.en: Did he have the fire? Did he have the will? Did he get exposed?
translation.es: ¿Tiene el fuego interno, la voluntad? ¿O quedó expuesto?

translation.en: That being said, if there's one thing we've learned from this guy
translation.es: ¿DE DÓNDE VIENE LA FUERZA? Dicho eso, si hay algo que hemos aprendido de él

translation.en: over the course of his career, it's to not doubt him.
translation.es: Dicho eso, si hay algo que hemos aprendido de él a lo largo de su carrera, es a no dudar de él.

translation.en: You know, that chip on his shoulder, that motivation,
translation.es: Ese resentimiento, esa motivación

translation.en: has always been a driving force for him.
translation.es: siempre ha sido su fuerza conductora.

translation.en: Sounds like you are the last person
translation.es: Eres la última persona

translation.en: that would ever give an excuse why you lost.
translation.es: que daría una excusa de tu derrota.

translation.en: Nah, nah, there is no excuse.
translation.es: No, no hay excusa.

translation.en: I've been beat before.
translation.es: Ya me han derrotado antes.

translation.en: I've lost MMA fights,
translation.es: He perdido peleas de MMA,

translation.en: I've lost boxing fights, I've lost so many fights in the gym,
translation.es: peleas de box, muchas peleas en el gimnasio,

translation.en: you know, I lose all the time. So, it is what it is.
translation.es: pierdo todo el tiempo. Es lo que es.

translation.en: Any true martial artist will know
translation.es: Un verdadero artista marcial sabe

translation.en: in order to succeed at this game, you must lose
translation.es: que para tener éxito debes perder

translation.en: a fucking shitload of times, you know what I mean?

translation.en: I don't bitch and moan.
translation.es: No me quejo de nada.

translation.en: We all have the same emotions and we have all won and we have all lost.

translation.en: It's a sport. It is what it is.

translation.en: Just get on with it. Look to learn-- Look to learn from it.

translation.en: The day you stop trying to learn is the day you start losing.
translation.es: El día que dejas de aprender, empiezas a perder.

translation.en: I'm always going to learn, regardless of the result.

translation.en: Win or lose, I will take something from it all.

translation.en: I don't know, feels a bit broke to be honest.

translation.en: That's the problem with Conor.
translation.es: Ese es el problema con Conor.

translation.en: This man has not won since November 2016.
translation.es: No ha ganado desde noviembre del 2016.

translation.en: Sometimes you gotta go to certain places in life to realize what we need to do.

translation.en: Let's fucking go!
translation.es: ¡Vamos, carajo!
